meanings.sent1: The skinny dog was so ribby that you could count each rib easily.
meanings.sent2: The ribby structure of the old building made it look fragile.
meanings.sent3: The ribby cat tried to squeeze through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: The ribby branches of the tree reached out like skeletal fingers.
meanings.sent5: The ribby outline of the leaf was delicate and intricate.

meanings.sent1: The ribby pattern on the fabric gave it a textured look.
meanings.sent2: The ribby design on the vase added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The ribby cake had a unique shape that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The ribby shadows on the wall created an interesting play of light.
meanings.sent5: The ribby edges of the bookshelf added a decorative element to the room.

meanings.sent1: She chose a ribby sweater to keep her warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent2: The ribby texture of the carpet felt soft underfoot.
meanings.sent3: The ribby blanket provided extra comfort on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The ribby surface of the ball made it easier to grip.
meanings.sent5: The ribby lining of the jacket added a stylish touch to the outfit.
